00064 
00065 #ifdef UNIXEM_SAFE_STR_USE_crtdefs_h_

00067 #endif /* UNIXEM_SAFE_STR_USE_crtdefs_h_ */
00068 
00069 #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00070 #elif defined(__DMC__)
00071 #elif defined(__GNUC__)
00072 #elif defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
00073 # if defined(_MSC_VER) && \
00074      _MSC_VER >= 1400
00075 #  define UNIXEM_SAFE_STR_USE_crtdefs_h_
00076 # endif /* _MSC_VER >= 1400 */
00077 #elif defined(__MWERKS__)
00078 #elif defined(__WATCOMC__)
00079 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00080 # if _MSC_VER >= 1400
00081 #  define UNIXEM_SAFE_STR_USE_crtdefs_h_
00082 # endif /* _MSC_VER >= 1400 */
00083 #elif defined(__COMO__)
00084 #else
00085 #endif /* compiler */
00086 
00087 #ifdef UNIXEM_SAFE_STR_USE_crtdefs_h_
00088 # include <crtdefs.h>
00089 #endif /* UNIXEM_SAFE_STR_USE_crtdefs_h_ */
00090

00100 #endif /* __STDC_SECURE_LIB__ */
